title: Larry's Flu Adventure
summary: A young boy named Larry gets the flu and receives loving care from his mother, including hot soup, orange juice, and cozy bedtime routines, in this heartwarming tale of recovery.
image_description: An illustration of a young boy in bed surrounded by tissues, a bowl of soup, and a caring mother by his side.
passage: Larry has the flu. His nose is running. He coughs a lot. He sneezes a lot. When he coughs, he covers his mouth. When he sneezes, he covers his mouth. When his nose is running, he wipes his nose with a tissue. Larry's mother is taking care of him. She makes hot soup for him. She gives him fresh orange juice. She makes him comfortable in his bed. She turns on the TV so he can watch TV in his bed. She turns out the light so he can sleep in his bed. She gives him medicine so he will get better. Larry will get better soon.
